summary: How the food industry sugar-coated science, sweetened the food supply, and seduced a planet, one spoonful at a time.
cast: Gary Taubes|Robert Lustig|Craig Wilcox|Alexis Gomez|Cristin Kearns|Yoni Freedhoff|Jean-Marc Schwarz|John Yudkin|Ancel Keys|Sami Inkinen|Merdith Loring|John L. Sievenpiper|Frank Lisciandro|Sheldon Reiser|Judith Hallfrisch|Stanton A. Glantz|Fredrick J. Stare|Arya M. Sharma|Kim Raine|Richard P. Ellis|Laura A. Schmidt
title: Bañado en azúcar
